mapper.select: select tid, uid, user_grade, creation_time from wx_interchange.team_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select team_user.tid, team_info.team_name, team_info.avatar_url `team_avatar_url`, team_info.grade `team_grade`, user_grade from wx_interchange.team_user left join wx_interchange.team_info on team_user.tid = team_info.tid where uid = #{uid} and user_grade = #{userGrade} and team_info.grade != 1

select team_user.uid, user_info.username, user_info.avatar_url `user_avatar_url`, user_grade, team_user.creation_time from wx_interchange.team_user left join wx_interchange.user_info on team_user.uid = user_info.uid where tid = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_interchange.team_user(tid, uid, user_grade) values (#{tid}, #{uid}, #{userGrade})
